blocks.name: cucn
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the uniform continuity operation.

blocks.name: df-ucn
blocks.content: Define a function on two uniform structures which value is the set of uniformly continuous functions from the first uniform structure to the second. A function ` f ` is uniformly continuous if, roughly speaking, it is possible to guarantee that ` ( f `` x ) ` and ` ( f `` y ) ` be as close to each other as we please by requiring only that ` x ` and ` y ` are sufficiently close to each other; unlike ordinary continuity, the maximum distance between ` ( f `` x ) ` and ` ( f `` y ) ` cannot depend on ` x ` and ` y ` themselves. This formulation is the definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.6. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: ucnval
blocks.content: The set of all uniformly continuous function from uniform space ` U ` to uniform space ` V ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: ucnimalem
blocks.content: Reformulate the ` G ` function as a mapping with one variable. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ucnimalem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cxp(c1, c1), cop(cfv(c2, cfv(c1st, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cfv(c2nd, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cust, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cust, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, co(c3, cucn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s1, s2, c1, c1, cop(cfv(c2, cv(s1)), cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

blocks.name: ucnprima
blocks.content: The preimage by a uniformly continuous function ` F ` of an entourage ` W ` of ` Y ` is an entourage of ` X ` . Note of the definition 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.6. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ucnprima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cust, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, co(c2, cucn, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cop(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))))
  mpbid(w0, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))), wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), c1)))
  ucnima(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  rexbidva(hs0, c2, w0, wss(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1)))
  sylancr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wb(wss(cima(c0, cv(hs0)), c1), wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))), wfun(c0), wss(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, c0, c3, c3, cop(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1))))
  syl6sseqr(cv(hs0), cdm(c0), cxp(c3, c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cv(hs0), cxp(c3, c3)), wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)))
  ustssxp(c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  funimass3(c0, cv(hs0), c1)
  rexlimdva(hs0, c2, w0, wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wss(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), c2)), wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cxp(c3, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c3)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cxp(c3, c3)))
  sseqtri(cima(ccnv(c0), c1), cxp(c3, c3), cdm(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c1)
  dmmpt2(s0, s1, c0, c3, c3, cop(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1))))
  opex(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cfv(c6, cv(s1)))
  ustssel(c2, c3, cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

thm ucnprima(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(`' c0 " c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(UnifOn ` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(UnifOn ` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈(c2[uCn]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ <(c6 ` s0),(c6 ` s1)>)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)

  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, (`' c0 " c1)∈ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ⊆(`' c0 " c1)))
  mpbid(w0, ∃(hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 ⊆(`' c0 " c1)), ∃(hs0 ∈ c2,(c0 " hs0)⊆ c1))
  ucnima(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  rexbidva(hs0, c2, w0, (c0 " hs0)⊆ c1, hs0 ⊆(`' c0 " c1))
  sylancr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), ((c0 " hs0)⊆ c1 ↔ hs0 ⊆(`' c0 " c1)), Fun(c0), hs0 ⊆ dom(c0))
  mpt2fun(s0, s1, c0, c3, c3, <(c6 ` s0),(c6 ` s1)>)

  ustssxp(c2, c3, hs0)

  rexlimdva(hs0, c2, w0, hs0 ⊆(`' c0 " c1), (`' c0 " c1)∈ c2)

  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, c2 ∈(UnifOn ` c3))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  a1i((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (`' c0 " c1)⊆(c3 × c3))
  sseqtri((`' c0 " c1), (c3 × c3), dom(c0))
  cnvimass(c0, c1)
  dmmpt2(s0, s1, c0, c3, c3, <(c6 ` s0),(c6 ` s1)>)
  opex((c6 ` s0), (c6 ` s1))
  ustssel(c2, c3, hs0, (`' c0 " c1))

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

  diff.hs0.c(c6)
